## Introduction

In this document, we will be exploring the Gapminder dataset.

## Observations of Gapminder

### Countries with life expectancy greater than 80

```{r life over 80, echo=TRUE}
gapminder2 <- gapminder %>% filter(lifeExp > 80)
gapminder2
```

These are the countries with life expectancy *over* **80**!
